desc: Let me introduce myself. I'm Alexandra from 2houses, the web platform and mobile app that help separated parents to communicate and get better organized for the well-being of their children. That a suite of tools that help the parents to organize their custody calendar, keep track of shared expenses and share school and medical information - in a neutral environment. Please have a look at [url removed, login to view] to discover/understand what we offer to our customers.What do we need:A 30'/45' script which should take place like this:Begin with something like a quick off the cuff like "oh what a time saved" or "how did I do before 2houses? »… let’s make sure we make the first 3 seconds captivating enough to have the viewers see the whole video.Follow with: I use 2houses, the web platform and mobile app that help separated parents to communicate and get better organized for the well-being of their children. (Feel free to change the words, make it yours)Explain how/why calendar section of 2houses helps you, which problem 2houses solvesIntroduce one of the benefit of 2houses: keep the children out of these parents things, reduces conflicts, facilitates day to day communicationThat was for the script.Then we need the actual video, a 30'/45' testimonial video linked to the script on a casual tone, the more candid, the better. I leave it with you for the environment, dress code etc - as long as it is all natural :wink:Send the script for review before you start with the video.Is it enough information to make a quote?
title: Testimonial video

desc: SPECIFIED BUDGET IS A PLACEHOLDER ONLY. PLEASE QUOTE YOUR PRICE AND EXPLAIN WHAT YOUR PROPOSED PRICE IS BASED ON/HOW IT IS CALCULATED.WE WILL CONSIDER THE JOBS YOU COMPLETED PREVIOUSLY, AMONG OTHER FACTORS, TO DECIDE IF THE PRICE YOU ARE QUOTING IS FAIR.PLEASE READ JOB DESCRIPTION and pay attention: we want NO CARTOONISH VIDEOS. If you can only do cartoons and send us cartoonish samples, we will have to reject your offer.We are currently looking at video studios that could create a promo video for a product we make. My company’s flagship product is Auslogics BoostSpeed – a program designed to clean, tweak, speed up and optimize PC performance. We are looking to have a video made to help users understand what our software can do for them (not an instructional video of how the product works, but rather a teaser to demonstrate how a person’s life/PC experience can change with BoostSpeed). I should tell you right away that it shouldn’t be anything cartoonish. It must speak of my company’s status as a respected leader and an authority in the PC optimization industry, but at the same time be fun and engaging.Ideally, this will be a video with the potential to go viral on social networks, one that people will be willing to share.
title: Promo video for a PC optimizer software product
